banners:
An adjustment has been applied to the assessment plan ST0063 v1.0 for this apprenticeship. The adjustment will run from 14.07.2023 and will run indefinitely until all apprentices registered to ST0063, v1.0 only, have completed their EPA and any required resits or retakes.
End-point assessment organisations (EPAOs) delivering EPAs for the apprenticeship will implement the adjustment, supported and monitored by the relevant EQA provider.
The key changes are:
Page 7 of the EPA plan, section 2 (written report) an increase to the range of qualified personnel who can verify the work described in the written report has been carried out by the apprentice to now include in exceptional circumstance the employer.
The key change is:  
In exceptional circumstances the apprentices written report may be verified by the employer, only where apprentice does not have access to any qualified personnel holding any of the levels of professional recognition listed below to verify their work . 
1. A Licentiate, Associate, Member or Fellow of CIBSE 
2. Registered as EngTech, IEng or CEng with any Engineering Council nominated institution 
3. Professionally registered within the construction industry (CIOB, RICS, RIBA).
